mapper.insert:
insert into ctMessages ( ctmgSender, ctmgSenderId, ctmgReceiver, ctmgMessage, ctcsSeq ) VALUES( #{ctmgSender}, #{ctmgSenderId}, #{ctmgReceiver}, #{ctmgMessage}, #{ctcsSeq}
)
mapper.select: select ctmgSender,ctmgReceiver , ctmgMessage,ctmgSenderId,ctmgSendDate from ctMessages where ctcsSeq = #{ctcsSeq} and (ctmgReceiver = #{myId} and ctmgSenderId = #{ctmgReceiver}) or (ctmgReceiver = #{ctmgReceiver} and ctmgSenderId =#{myId}) order by ctmgSendDate asc;
